casebody.data:
Lena Anna SELWAY, as Administratrix of the Estate of Roger Watts Selway, Deceased, Appellee, v. The PENNSYLVANIA RAILROAD COMPANY, Appellant. No. 406. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 30, 1939. Burlingham, Veeder, Clark & Hupper, of New York City (Ray Rood Allen and G. Hunter Merritt, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Simone N. Gazan and Gazan & Caldwell, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
